woahoh woah

all that that means is neither of us are listening
and whats even worse that we dont

so both of us are mad for nothing fighting for
nothing crying for
nothing woah ohoh
but we wont let it go for nothing come back for
nothing it should be nothing
to a love like what we got

oh no no no
see neyo liveget tickets as low as 54you might also likeverse 2

asking questions like you already know

this aint the way that love is supposed to go
what happened to workin it out
we fall into this place where you aint backin down
and i aint backin down
so what the hell do we do now
